amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to prohibit the use of funds for the Ground Based Strategic Deterrent (GBSD) program and W87-1.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Ground Based Strategic Deterrent (GBSD) program and W87-1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A021) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 118 - 299 (Roll no. 282).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A021) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A021) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 118 - 299 (Roll no. 282).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A021) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 118 - 299 (Roll no. 282).
